text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityClass where concept is-a PUB

name: EntityClassPublicInstitution
title: EntityClassPublicInstitution
description: An agency of the people of a state often assuming some authority over a certain matter. Includes government, governmental agencies, associations.
